utterance: Samuel Achilefu: to Washington University in St. Louis. I work in the area of cancer imaging, molecular imaging in particular and in interventional radiology as well. So I look forward to your ideas and brainstorming sessions.

annotations.express enthusiasm: The speaker expresses enthusiasm by saying he looks forward to the ideas and brainstorming sessions.

utterance: Maryellen Giger: So I'm Mary Ellen Giger from University of Chicago. I'm in radiology and medical physics and I um work in AI and medical imaging. I've done it for multiple decades um both in development, uh research, effects of different parameters as well as translation to clinical through um translational FDA work.

annotations.explain or define term or concept: The speaker is introducing herself and her background, which includes defining her areas of expertise (radiology, medical physics, AI, medical imaging).
annotations.present new idea: The speaker is presenting her background and experience in AI and medical imaging, which is a new idea in the context of the conversation.
